page.text: The little rodent looks up at you. Defeated she lets out a pliantive squeek and clutches her tail for comfort as you loom over her.

The weakened ratgirl squeaks and tries to wiggle away as you pick her up by the nape. She’s not really big, but will count as a free snack. So not waiting for long you open your mouth and shove almost half of the ratgirl inside. Another squeak echoes into your throat, quickly followed by a loud gulp. The snack tries to squirm still, pushing her lil hands into the throat walls and rubbing your neck from inside, but one more swallow sends most of her torso past your jaws.

You can feel her soft booty shaking around close enough to let you lick at and tease the short meal before gulping her down. Her legs and the long, thin tail slide in soon after as the whole ratgirl lands into your stomach and curls up, making just a lil visible lump. And your belly will start gurgling soon, easily breaking down a squirmy appetizer. Well, after all the ratgirl works better than some not-squirmy fruits.

The ratgirl squirms in your grip, weakly trying to break free and escape. She’s pretty short and will work great as a pleasure source for you. With a chuckle your spread your thighs wide apart and press the smaller girl into the sensitive folds. Her little hands rub into the pussy lips and then further into the moist tunnel, caressing it in a really pleasant way as more of the ratgirl slides inside. Feels like you got an extra warm, squirmy dildo sliding into your pussy, and then even deeper as you push at the soft booty.

Another squeak vibrates into your womb as first of the ratgirl starts sliding inside. Her body fits easily within the tight, hot chamber in your abdomen, able to curl without any effort. And she’ll make just a cute, small lump outside. The long tail smoothly slides in as the pussy muscles tug last bits of the new ‘guest’. You can feel the ratgirl moving around still and rubbing into the sensitive walls as your womb starts working and melting the rat into a warm puddle for your pussy to leak later.
